content.title: Cardiac MRI - Short axis and 4-chamber views

note.text: Cardiac MRI demonstrates asymmetric septal hypertrophy measuring 25mm at the basal septum. Systolic anterior motion (SAM) of the mitral valve leaflet is present with associated dynamic LVOT obstruction. No late gadolinium enhancement identified, suggesting absence of myocardial fibrosis. Left ventricular ejection fraction 68%. No pericardial effusion.
